import {css} from "emotion";
 
// import {unitMath} from "../../../../utils/css-utils";
 
export default function labeledIconButton(buttonVars) {
 
  const {
    labeledIconPadding,
    horizontalPadding,
    labeledIconMargin,
    labeledIconWidth,
    labeledIconBackgroundColor,
    labeledIconLeftShadow,
 
  } = buttonVars;
 
  return css`
    /*--------------
      Labeled Icon
    ---------------*/
 
    & {
      position: relative;
      padding-left: ${labeledIconPadding} !important;
      padding-right: ${horizontalPadding} !important;
 
    }
    /* Left Labeled */
    & > .icon {
      position: absolute;
      height: 100%;
      line-height: 1;
      border-radius: 0px;
      border-top-left-radius: inherit;
      border-bottom-left-radius: inherit;
      text-align: center;
 
      margin: ${labeledIconMargin};
      width: ${labeledIconWidth};
      background-color: ${labeledIconBackgroundColor};
      box-shadow: ${labeledIconLeftShadow};
 
      top: 0em;
      left: 0em;
    }
 
 
    & > .icon > svg {
      display: block;
      position: absolute;
      width: 100%;
      top: 50%;
      text-align: center;
      transform: translateY(-50%);
    }
 
 
  `;
}
